author: JJ Nattrass
title: 'She's always there': Katie Price 'is casting a shadow' over Peter Andre and Emily MacDonagh's marriage
text:
Following a seven-year feud they managed to get their relationship back on a cordial footing. 
But it would seem Katie Price 's recent behaviour has put her ex-husband Peter Andre on the back foot - thanks to her insistence on talking about Peter. 
Following her recent revelation that she hasn't changed her will since she was married to the singer, 43, Reveal reports Peter and wife, Emily MacDonagh, have begun to feel she is 'casting a shadow' over their marriage. 
During a recent instalment of Loose Women the former glamour model, 38, told her fellow hosts and the audience at home that Peter would get "everything" , as she hasn't changed her will. 
But it seems Katie's revelation on TV has caused her first husband and his new wife to question her behaviour, as a source close to the couple and Katie told the magazine: 
"Both Peter and Emily think there was an ulterior motive for Katie saying this about her will - to throw a spanner in their relationship." Katie Price is said to be creating tension between herself and her ex husband, Peter, and his wife Emily (Photo: Getty) 
And while both Emily and Katie are said to have been on very good terms, this latest "publicity stunt" has given the 27-year-old Doctor some cause for thought. 
The inside explained: "It's like they're haunted by the spectre of Katie Price and it seems to affect their lives every day." 
Mirror Celeb has contacted representative of both Katie and Peter for comment. 
The apparent tension comes just a week after Katie sensationally revealed that her will hasn't changed since she married Peter in 2005. 
"If I died now Pete would get everything,” she admitted to her fellow panelists. A source close to Peter and Emily told reveal: "It's they're haunted by the spectre of Katie Price" (Photo: Rex Features) The rumoured tensions come after Katie revealed Peter is named her will - despite being married to Kieran Hayler (pictured) (Photo: Rex Features) 
"Junior, Princess and Harvey, I haven't even changed my will thinking of it. So let's hope nothing happens because why should they get it? 
“And I’ve been married twice since then!” 
After Katie and Peter divorced in 2009, she was married to cage fighter Alex Reid for two years, from 2010-2012. 
Since 2013 she has been married to Kieran Hayler, while Peter and Emily have been married since 2015. Like us on Facebook
